body:
Okay so... here is my interpretation of the event, all of that were a dream. Vegeta could not transform in SSJ3 at all so he was damn frustrated and someway, he dreamed about being Goku's bitch, he awoke later in capsule corp as a SSJ3 thank to the trauma caused by his dream... but now don't know what to say to his family and Goku about "HOW" he finally become a SSJ3...
Don't think too much about this, this a just a way for me to cope with what i just see right now.. let's me live in denial a little longer.
Why did they do this? Why?
Is this even the same artist?!?! o_O My poor childhood...
